cards.rules_text:
{WU}: Flash Control
{UB}: Token Death
{BR}: Conspire Control
{RG}: Energy
{GW}: Backup Counters OR [i]Battalion[/i]
{WB}: Sidekick Aristocrats
{UR}: Draw Two
{BG}: Ramp w/Reanimator Subtheme
{RW}: Supercharge
{GU}: Self-Bounce OR Backup Counters

Whenever a creature you control dies, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
Sidekick {1}{W}{B} [i]({1}{W}{B}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a token that's a copy of it, except it's 1/1. Activate only as a sorcery.)[/i]

Flying
When this creature enters, you may discard a card. If you do, create two Mission tokens. [i](They're colorless battles an opponent protects with 2 defense and “When this battle is defeated, draw a card.”)[/i]

When this enchantment enters, you get {E}{E}.
Whenever you get one or more {E}, target creature you control gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn. This ability triggers only once each turn.

When this creature enters, create two 1/1 blue, black, and red Minion creature tokens.
Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, this creature deals 1 damage to each opponent.

cards.rules_text:
Haste
Supercharge — Create a 1/1 red and white Warrior creature token that's tapped and attacking. [i](Whenever this creature attacks, you get {E}. Then you may spend {E}{E}{E} to activate its supercharge ability.)[/i]

Conspire [i](As you cast this spell, you may tap two untapped creatures you control that share a color with it. When you do, copy it and you may choose a new target for the copy.)[/i]
Exile the top card of your library and up to one target creature card from your graveyard. You may play cards exiled this way until the end of your next turn.

Reach, deathtouch
When this creature enters, it deals 4 damage to target creature, planeswalker, or battle.

Flash
Flying
At the beginning of your end step, if you haven't cast a spell this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature and you gain 1 life.
Whenever you draw your second card each turn, create a 1/1 colorless Drone artifact creature token with flying.
Flying

Menace, lifelink
Whenever a token you control is put into the graveyard from the battlefield, surveil 1. If this is the third time this ability has triggered this turn, each opponent loses 3 life. [i](To surveil 1, look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)[/i]
You gain 3 life. Scry 1, then draw a card.
Return target permanent card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

Reach
At the beginning of your end step, if a creature died this turn, create a 1/2 green Spider creature token with reach.
